string-array.name: All_About_Gordon_Ramsay
string-array.item: Where is the lamb sauce?:Here:Not here:Here:Not here:Not here
What is his favorite fast food restaurant?:InNOut:Chickfila:Panda Express:Five Guys:InNOut
What sport did he almost go professional in?:Soccer:Soccer:Wrestling:Swimming:Lacrosse
What would his last meal on Earth be?:Beef Wellington:Fish and chips:Filet mignon:Beef Wellington:Crab legs

string-array.name: RandomFacts
string-array.item: How much of the world\'s water do glaciers hold?:69 percent:15 percent:45 percent:69 percent:77 percent
How fast was the fastest gust of wind ever recorded?:253 mph:150 mph:253 mph:302 mph:326 mph
Where is the best place in the world to see Rainbows?:Hawaii:Hawaii:The Philippines:Fiji:The Bahamas
What animal can be used to map out the ocean floor?:Whales:Dolphins:Sharks:Sea Anemone:Whales
What is the oldest profession in the world?:Dentistry:Dentistry:Philosophy:Scribes:Surgery
What countries can you not buy Coca Cola in?:North Korea and Cuba:Iran and Syria:North Korea and Cuba:Eritrea and Guinea:Saudi Arabia and Singapore

string-array.name: Christmas_Movie_Quotes
string-array.item: What movie is the quote \' They say that the Grinch\'s heart grew three sizes that day\' from:Grinch:Elf:Grinch:The Christmas Story:Christmas Vacation
What movie is the quote \' Will you please tell Santa that instead of presents this year I just want my family back\' from:Home Alone:Charlie Brown Chistmas:Grinch:Home Alone:Die Hard

What movie is the quote \' It\'s Christmas Eve. It\'s the one night of the year when we all act a little nicer, we smile a little easier, we cheer a little more\' from:Scrooged:Scrooged:Die Hard:Grinch:Home Alone
What movie is the quote \' Seeing isn\'t believing. Believing is seeing\' from:The Santa Clause:Die Hard:Grinch:The Santa Clause:Home Alone
What movie is the quote \' I think you\'re really beautiful and I feel really warm when I\'m around you and my tongue swells up\' from:Elf:Elf:Die Hard:Grinch:Home Alone
